title: B2B Account Team
description: A mapping between the B2B Account accountOwnerID field and one or more userIDs in B2B Sales User.

xdm:teamID.description: Unique identifier for team containing one or more team members.
xdm:teamID.title: Team ID

xdm:userID.description: Unique identifier for a single user that is part of the team.
xdm:userID.title: User ID
